text: Kinva tya andharansarakhe ahe je khupa khola samudrata asaveta, jyala latevara lata jhakata asavi, maga tyavara dhaga pasarale asaveta. Arthata andharavara andhara asava. Jara apala hata bahera kadhila tara tohi pahane tyala sakya nasave, ani (vastutah) jyala allahaneca nura na dyava tyacyajavala konatahi nura (prakasa) nasato
